content.question: The aggregate demand curve is downward sloping because an increase in the general price level will cause the demand for money, interest rates, and investment to change in which of the following ways?

choices.label: Demand for Money Interest Rates Investment Increase Increase Increase
Demand for Money Interest Rates Investment Increase Increase Decrease
Demand for Money Interest Rates Investment Increase Decrease Increase
Demand for Money Interest Rates Investment Decrease Increase Decrease
Demand for Money Interest Rates Investment Decrease Decrease Increase

content.answer: Demand for Money Interest Rates Investment Increase Increase Decrease

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
